FuncDef: The display snmp-agent sys-info command displays system information on an existing SNMP device. The information includes contact information about the system maintenance, the physical location of the device, and the SNMP version.
CLIs: display snmp-agent sys-info [ contact | location | version ] *

ParaDef.Info:
Displays physical location information of an existing SNMP device.
-

Displays the SNMP version running on an existing device.
-

Displays contact information on an existing SNMP device.
-

Examples: The contact person for this managed node:
The physical location of this node:
SNMP version running in the system:
SNMP version running in the system:
The contact person for this managed node:
The physical location of this node:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the contact information about the system maintenance, physical location of the device, and SNMP version, run the display snmp-agent sys-info command.
